Let’s talk about climate change on a wide range of crazy perspective..I cannot wrap my mind around the scale of what the next 30 years would look like. The recent IPCC Report of UN argues that we have only 2040 until we face the point of no return.

  • Ice caps melting.
  • Ocean Acidification
  • Extreme heatwaves
  • Massive Storms
  • Sea level rise
  • War and famine

all is probable unless we change our ways of living..
